s: January 6, 2025 - In 1977, Procter & Gamble launched Zest in France, followed by Italy and the UK in 1982. The European version of Zest was yellow and marbled, and it used the same formulation as Coast in the U.S. The brand was subsequently withdrawn in Europe.
